div.p: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes an encounter between a care professional and the patient (or patient's record).

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where constraint = <<185316007 OR <<308467007 OR <<185201007

description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes an encounter between a care professional and the patient (or patient's record).
